text: Blue Collar is a 1978 crime drama movie. It was directed by first time director Paul Schrader. It stars Harvey Keitel, Yaphet Kotto and Richard Pryor. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1978 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies directed by Paul Schrader Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Detroit
title: Blue Collar (movie)
